registerCard.prepareCitizenIdentificationCard: Please prepare your Citizen Identification Card and related documents.
registerCard.pleaseCarefullyReview: Please carefully review and enter the information accurately, as some details may be unchangeable in the subsequent steps
registerCard.step1: Step 1: Take a photo of personal documents
registerCard.captureOneOfTheTwoValid: Capture one of the two valid identification documents: ID card or Citizen Identification Card
registerCard.ensure: Ensure that the photo angle is clear, not blurry, and free from glare
registerCard.step2: Step 2: Take a photo of your face
registerCard.theSystemTakesPhotosAutomatically: The system takes photos automatically; please follow the instruction
registerCard.takeAPhotoOfTheFrontSideOfIDCard: Take a photo of the front side of ID card
registerCard.position: Position the four corners of the ID card within the frame.
registerCard.takeAPhotoOfTheBackSideOfIDCard: Take a photo of the back side of ID card
registerCard.placeYourFaceWithinTheFrame: Place your face within the frame
registerCard.middleNameAndFirstName: Middle name and first name (in this order)
registerCard.inThisContextNotExceeding19Characters: In this context, it's advising the customer to enter their full name exactly as it appears on their ID card or passport, not exceeding 19 characters
registerCard.weWillSendAConfirmationCode: We will send a confirmation code to this phone number
registerCard.theInformationIProvideInThisRegistration: The information I provide in this registration form is accurate and complete, and I have the right to provide the above information to the bank.
registerCard.IAuthorizeTheBank: I authorize the bank to contact relevant parties for verification and to collect additional information at any time
registerCard.IUnderstandAndAgree: I understand and agree that all personal information I provide in this registration process will be collected, stored, and processed by the bank, whether my credit card application is successful or not. In the event that my application is approved, all information provided in this registration will replace the information I have previously registered with the bank (if any)
registerCard.IUnderstandAndAgreeThatThisApplication: I understand and agree that this application and the information I provide during the registration process may be accessed/retrieved at any time using the authentication methods applied by the bank at each specific time.
registerCard.thisApplicationAndRelatedIssues: This application and related issues regarding the security of personal information are subject to the sole jurisdiction of Vietnamese law
registerCard.IConfirmMyAgreement: I confirm my agreement with the following terms:
registerCard.IWouldLikeToReceive: I would like to receive the credit card, credit card PIN, phone banking PIN, and other related documents at:
registerCard.yourInformationHasBeenSavedInTheSystem: Your information has been saved in the system. Please visit the nearest bank to complete the procedure
registerCard.IAgreeToReceiveMonthlyCredit: I agree to receive monthly credit card statements via personal email.

cardList.chooseTheAppropriateCard: Choose the appropriate card for you

policy.description: This Privacy Policy ("Policy") governs the collection, use, and disclosure of personal information when you use the "Card Insight" mobile application ("App") provided by Solid Tech ("we," "us," or "our"). This Policy is designed to help you understand how we collect, process, and safeguard your personal information. By using the App, you agree to the terms outlined in this Policy.
policy.info1: Personal Information: We may collect personal information that you provide directly, such as your name, email address, and other contact information when you register or communicate with us.
policy.info2: Usage Information: We automatically collect information about your use of the App, including device information, log data, and usage patterns.
policy.use1: Providing Services: We use your personal information to provide, maintain, and improve the App's functionality and services.
policy.use2: Communication: We may use your contact information to communicate with you regarding updates, news, and support-related matters.
policy.use3: Analytics: We utilize analytics tools to analyze user behavior, enhance user experience, and improve our services.
policy.use4: Legal Compliance: We may process your information to comply with legal obligations and protect our rights.
policy.share1: Third-Party Service Providers: We may share your information with third-party service providers to assist with App functionality and services.
policy.share2: Legal Requirements: We may disclose your information in response to a legal request or when required by law.
policy.share3: Consent: We may share your information with your consent or as otherwise disclosed at the time of collection.
policy.securityDescription: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction.
policy.choice1: Opt-Out: You may opt-out of receiving promotional communications from us by following the instructions provided in such communications.
policy.choice2: Access and Correction: You can request access to your personal information and make corrections by contacting us at {{address}}
policy.childrenPrivacyDescription: The App is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect or solicit personal information from children.
policy.changesDescription: We reserve the right to modify this Policy at any time. The updated Policy will be effective upon posting the revised version.
policy.contactInfo: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at {{address}}
policy.appPolicy: By using the "Card Insight" App, you acknowledge that you have read and agree to this Privacy Policy.
